scripts.dev: wait-port 127.0.0.1:8545 && pnpm run deploy:contracts && pnpm run start:alto
scripts.start:alto: pushd node_modules/alto; pnpm install; popd; pnpm alto run --config ./config.localhost.json
scripts.deploy:gas-tank: cd ./node_modules/@latticexyz/gas-tank/packages/contracts && pnpm install && pnpm mud deploy --rpc http://127.0.0.1:8545 --salt '0x00'
